feed.title: BIP proposal - patch to raise selfish mining threshold.

entry.title: BIP proposal - patch to raise selfish mining threshold.
entry.summary: Ittay sent an email on November 5, 2013 expressing concern about potential attacks on Bitcoin by smart people at their computers. He mentioned the need to quickly publish and fix any exploits discovered. Another individual responded by suggesting that it would be helpful to actually implement an attack to see how quickly it could be done.
